tvestergaard.fog.data.materials

Interface MaterialDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MysqlMaterialDAO

    public interface MaterialDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Material create(MaterialBlueprint blueprint)
      Inserts a new material into the data storage.
      Material first(Constraint<MaterialColumn>... constraints)
      Returns the first material matching the provided constraints.

      Returns the materials in the data storage.

      Returns a list of the attributes required for the provided category id.

      Returns a complete list of the materials in the provided categories.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.List<Material> get(Constraint<MaterialColumn>... constraints)
                      throws DataAccessException
        Returns the materials in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The complete list of the materials in the data storage.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • first

        Material first(Constraint<MaterialColumn>... constraints)
        throws DataAccessException
        Returns the first material matching the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The first material matching the provided constraints. Returns null when no constraints matches the provided constraints.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • create

        Material create(MaterialBlueprint blueprint)
         throws DataAccessException
        Inserts a new material into the data storage.
        Parameters:
        blueprint - The material blueprint that contains the information necessary to create the material.
        Returns:
        The material instance representing the newly created material.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • update

        boolean update(MaterialUpdater updater)
        throws DataAccessException
        Updates the entity in the data storage to match the provided material.
        Parameters:
        updater - The material updater that contains the information necessary to create the material.
        Returns:
        true if the record was updated.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • getAttributesFor

        java.util.Set<AttributeDefinition> getAttributesFor(int category)
                                             throws DataAccessException
        Returns a list of the attributes required for the provided category id.
        Parameters:
        category - The category id to return the required attributes for.
        Returns:
        The list of the attributes required for the provided category id.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • getCategories

        java.util.List<Category> getCategories()
                                throws DataAccessException
        Returns the complete list of the categories in the application.
        Returns:
        The complete list of the categories in the application.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • getByCategory

        com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.Integer,SimpleMaterial> getByCategory(int... categories)
                                                                            throws DataAccessException
        Returns a complete list of the materials in the provided categories.
        Parameters:
        categories - The categories to return the materials from.
        Returns:
        The materials in the provided categories, mapped to that category in the multimap.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • size

        int size()
  throws DataAccessException
        Returns the number of materials in the data storage.
        Returns:
        The number of materials in the data storage.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.
